bookBuilder.title: Ukufaka BookBuilder

upload.title: Faka amaxwebhu akho
upload.dragDrop: Tsala uze ubeke ifayile ye-ZIP apha

messages.importTip: üìù Icebiso Lokungenisa: Ukuba amaxwebhu akho e-Word anomxholo oxubeneyo (izihloko, itafile yomxholo, ulwazi lombhali, njl.), i-BookBuilder inokwenza amacandelo ongezelelweyo. Emva kokungenisa, unokususa ngokulula amacandelo ongawafuniyo kwaye ushenxise umxholo phakathi kwe-Front Matter, Main Matter, ne-Back Matter njengoko kufuneka.
messages.systemPages: Iphepha Lesihloko kunye ne-Copyright ziyenziwa ngokuzenzekelayo - naliphi na iphepha lesihloko/copyright elingenisiweyo liye latsalwa.
messages.languageNote: Amaxwebhu aya kuhlulwa kusetyenziswa iipateni zolwimi {{language}}.

classification.title: Phonononga Uhlulo Lwamaxwebhu
classification.subtitle: Rhuqa amacandelo phakathi kweendidi ukuze ulungelelanise isakhiwo sencwadi yakho
classification.frontMatterDesc: Iphepha lesihloko, ilungelo lokushicilela, ukuzinikela, isandulelo, ithebula lokuqukethwe
classification.backMatterDesc: Isigqibo, isiphetho, isithasiselo, isichazi-magama, isalathiso, izinkomba

validation.noFile: Nceda ukhethe ifayile ye-ZIP ukuze uyilayishe.
validation.fileTooLarge: Ifayile inkulu kakhulu. Ubungakanani obuphezulu ngu-50MB.
validation.noDocuments: Akukho maxwebhu e-Word afunyenweyo kwifayile ye-ZIP.
validation.processingFailed: Kusilele ukucubungula amaxwebhu. Nceda ujonge ifomati yefayile.

bookBuilder.dragToReorder: Rhuqa amacandelo ukuze uwahlele kwakhona ngaphakathi kweendidi okanye usebenzise i-dropdown ethi "SHENXISA" ukuze utshintshe amacandelo phakathi kwe-Front/Main/Back Matter
